mapper.select:
select sr.uri uri, sr.name resName,
from sa_menu sm left join sa_resource sr on sm.resource_id=sr.id where p_menu_id is null
mapper.update:
update sa_menu
resource_id=#{resourceId},
menu_title=#{menuTitle},
p_menu_id=#{pMenuId},
link_type=#{linkType},
select_img=#{selectImg},
unselect_img=#{unselectImg},
order_id=#{orderId},
enable=#{enable},
create_by=#{createBy},
create_time=#{createTime},
update_by=#{updateBy},
update_time=#{updateTime},
menu_type=#{menuType},
menu_classify= #{menuClassify},
where id=#{id}
mapper.sql: sm.id, sm.resource_id, sm.menu_title, sm.p_menu_id, sm.link_type, sm.menu_type, sm.menu_classify, sm.select_img, sm.unselect_img, sm.order_id, sm.enable, sm.create_by, (CASE WHEN sm.create_by is not NULL THEN (SELECT user_name FROM sa_user WHERE id = sm.create_by) ELSE NULL END ) AS createUserName , sm.create_time, DATE_FORMAT(sm.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createTimeStr, sm.update_by, (CASE WHEN sm.update_by is not NULL THEN (SELECT user_name FROM sa_user WHERE id = sm.update_by) ELSE NULL END ) AS updateUserName , sm.update_time, DATE_FORMAT(sm.update_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as updateTimeStr
mapper.insert: insert into sa_menu (resource_id, menu_title, p_menu_id, link_type, menu_type,menu_classify, select_img, unselect_img, order_id, enable, create_by, create_time) values (#{menu.resourceId}, #{menu.menuTitle}, #{menu.pMenuId}, #{menu.linkType}, #{menu.menuType},#{menu.menuClassify}, #{menu.selectImg}, #{menu.unselectImg}, #{menu.orderId}, #{menu.enable}, #{menu.createBy}, now())
